name: WinDat Opener - extract Winmail.dat
description: WinDat Opener will help you to extract files and message with all attributes from Winmail.dat files. Just open an app and choose right file. The app is absolutely free and doesnt include any in-app purchases.  All data from opened Winmail.dat files are saved in /storage/WinDatOpener. No need to open the same file twice, just navigate to previously folder
